020package org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal;
021
022import static java.util.Arrays.stream;
023import static java.util.stream.Collectors.toList;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
025import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
026import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.MAINTAINED;
027import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_BOOLEAN;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_BYTE;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_CHAR;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_DOUBLE;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_FLOAT;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_INT;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_LONG;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_SHORT;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.BOXED_VOID;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.OBJECT;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
039
040import javax.lang.model.element.Modifier;
041import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
042import javax.lang.model.element.TypeParameterElement;
043import javax.lang.model.type.ArrayType;
044import javax.lang.model.type.DeclaredType;
045import javax.lang.model.type.ErrorType;
046import javax.lang.model.type.NoType;
047import javax.lang.model.type.PrimitiveType;
048import javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind;
049import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
050import javax.lang.model.util.SimpleTypeVisitor14;
051import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
052import java.lang.reflect.GenericArrayType;
053import java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType;
054import java.lang.reflect.Type;
055import java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable;
056import java.lang.reflect.WildcardType;
057import java.util.ArrayList;
058import java.util.Collection;
059import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
060import java.util.List;
061import java.util.Map;
062import java.util.Optional;
063
064import org.apiguardian.api.API;
065import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
066import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.UnexpectedExceptionError;
067import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.AnnotationSpec;
068import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.JavaComposer;
069import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ParameterizedTypeName;
070import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeName;
071import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeVariableName;
072import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Lazy;
073
074/**
075 *  The implementation of
076 *  {@link TypeNameImpl}
077 *  as representation of any type in Java's type system, plus {@code void}.
078 *
079 *  @author Square,Inc.
080 *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
081 *  @version $Id: TypeNameImpl.java 1066 2023-09-28 19:51:53Z tquadrat $
082 *  @since 0.0.5
083 *
084 *  @UMLGraph.link
085 */
086@SuppressWarnings( "ClassWithTooManyFields" )
087@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: TypeNameImpl.java 1066 2023-09-28 19:51:53Z tquadrat $" )
088@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
089public sealed class TypeNameImpl implements TypeName
090    permits ArrayTypeNameImpl, ClassNameImpl, ParameterizedTypeNameImpl, TypeVariableNameImpl, WildcardTypeNameImpl
091{
092        /*-----------*\
093    ====** Constants **========================================================
094        \*-----------*/
095    /**
096     *  The type name for {@code boolean}.
097     */
098    public static final TypeNameImpl BOOLEAN_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "boolean" );
099
100    /**
101     *  The type name for {@code byte}.
102     */
103    public static final TypeNameImpl BYTE_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "byte" );
104
105    /**
106     *  The type name for {@code char}.
107     */
108    public static final TypeNameImpl CHAR_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "char" );
109
110    /**
111     *  The type name for {@code double}.
112     */
113    public static final TypeNameImpl DOUBLE_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "double" );
114
115    /**
116     *  The type name for {@code float}.
117     */
118    public static final TypeNameImpl FLOAT_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "float" );
119
120    /**
121     *  The type name for {@code int}.
122     */
123    public static final TypeNameImpl INT_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "int" );
124
125    /**
126     *  The type name for {@code long}.
127     */
128    public static final TypeNameImpl LONG_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "long" );
129
130    /**
131     *  The type name for {@code short}.
132     */
133    public static final TypeNameImpl SHORT_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "short" );
134
135    /**
136     *  The type name for {@code void}.
137     */
138    public static final TypeNameImpl VOID_PRIMITIVE = new TypeNameImpl( "void" );
139
140        /*------------*\
141    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
142        \*------------*/
143    /**
144     *  The annotations for this type.
145     */
146    private final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> m_Annotations;
147
148    /**
149     *  Lazily initialised return value of
150     *  {@link #toString()}
151     *  of this type name.
152     */
153    private final Lazy<String> m_CachedString;
154
155    /**
156     *  The name of this type if it is a keyword.
157     */
158    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
159    private final Optional<String> m_Keyword;
160
161        /*--------------*\
162    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
163        \*--------------*/
164    /**
165     *  Creates a new {@code TypeNameImpl} instance.
166     *
167     *  @param  keyword The name of this type if it is a keyword, {@code null}
168     *      otherwise.
169     */
170    public TypeNameImpl( final String keyword ) { this( keyword, List.of() ); }
171
172    /**
173     *  Creates a new {@code TypeNameImpl} instance.
174     *
175     *  @param  keyword The name of this type if it is a keyword, {@code null}
176     *      otherwise.
177     *  @param  annotations The annotations for this type name.
178     */
179    public TypeNameImpl( final String keyword, final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations )
180    {
181        m_Keyword = Optional.ofNullable( keyword );
182        m_Annotations = List.copyOf( requireNonNullArgument( annotations, "annotations" ) );
183
184        m_CachedString = Lazy.use( this::initialiseCachedString );
185    }   //  TypeNameImpl()
186
187    /**
188     *  Creates a new {@code TypeNameImpl} instance.
189     *
190     *  @param  annotations The annotations for this type name.
191     */
192    public TypeNameImpl( final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations ) { this( null, annotations ); }
193
194        /*---------*\
195    ====** Methods **==========================================================
196        \*---------*/
197    /**
198     *  {@inheritDoc}
199     */
200    @Override
201    public TypeNameImpl annotated( final List<AnnotationSpec> annotations )
202    {
203        final var combined = concatAnnotations( requireNonNullArgument( annotations, "annotations" ) );
204        final var retValue = new TypeNameImpl( m_Keyword.orElse( null ), combined );
205
206        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
207        return retValue;
208    }   //  annotated()
209
210    /**
211     *  Returns the annotations for this type name.
212     *
213     *  @return The annotations.
214     */
215    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
216    public final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations() { return m_Annotations; }
217
218    /**
219     *  Returns the given type name as an array; the return value is empty if
220     *  it is not an array.
221     *
222     *  @param  type    The type name.
223     *  @return An instance of
224     *      {@link Optional}
225     *      that holds the array type name.
226     */
227    @SuppressWarnings( "ClassReferencesSubclass" )
228    public static final Optional<ArrayTypeNameImpl> asArray( final TypeName type )
229    {
230        final Optional<ArrayTypeNameImpl> retValue = type instanceof final ArrayTypeNameImpl arrayType
231            ? Optional.of( arrayType )
232            : Optional.empty();
233
234        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
235        return retValue;
236    }   //  asArray()
237
238    /**
239     *  {@inheritDoc}
240     */
241    @SuppressWarnings( {"MethodWithMultipleReturnPoints", "OverlyComplexMethod"} )
242    @Override
243    public final TypeNameImpl box()
244    {
245        if( m_Keyword.isEmpty() ) return this; // Doesn't need boxing.
246        if( this == VOID_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_VOID;
247        if( this == BOOLEAN_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_BOOLEAN;
248        if( this == BYTE_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_BYTE;
249        if( this == SHORT_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_SHORT;
250        if( this == INT_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_INT;
251        if( this == LONG_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_LONG;
252        if( this == CHAR_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_CHAR;
253        if( this == FLOAT_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_FLOAT;
254        if( this == DOUBLE_PRIMITIVE ) return BOXED_DOUBLE;
255
256        //---* Something went awfully wrong ... *------------------------------
257        throw new AssertionError( m_Keyword.get() );
258    }   //  box()
259
260    /**
261     *  Combines the annotations of this instance with the given ones.
262     *
263     *  @param  annotations The annotations to add.
264     *  @return The combined list of annotations.
265     */
266    protected final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> concatAnnotations( final Collection<AnnotationSpec> annotations )
267    {
268        final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> list = new ArrayList<>( m_Annotations );
269        annotations.stream().map( a -> (AnnotationSpecImpl) a ).forEach( list::add );
270        final var retValue = List.copyOf( list );
271
272        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
273        return retValue;
274    }   //  concatAnnotations()
275
276    /**
277     *  Emits this type name instance to the given
278     *  {@link CodeWriter}.
279     *
280     *  @param  out The code writer.
281     *  @return The code writer.
282     *  @throws UncheckedIOException Something went wrong when emitting to the
283     *      output target.
284     */
285    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
286    public CodeWriter emit( final CodeWriter out ) throws UncheckedIOException
287    {
288        var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( out, "out" );
289        if( m_Keyword.isEmpty() ) throw new AssertionError();
290
291        if( isAnnotated() )
292        {
293            retValue = retValue.emit( "" );
294            retValue = emitAnnotations( retValue );
295        }
296        retValue = retValue.emitAndIndent( m_Keyword.get() );
297
298        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
299        return retValue;
300    }   //  emit()
301
302    /**
303     *  Emits the annotation from this type name instance to the given
304     *  {@link CodeWriter}.
305     *
306     *  @param  out The code writer.
307     *  @return The code writer.
308     *  @throws UncheckedIOException Something went wrong when emitting to the
309     *      output target.
310     */
311    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
312    protected final CodeWriter emitAnnotations( final CodeWriter out ) throws UncheckedIOException
313    {
314        var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( out, "out" );
315        for( final var annotation : m_Annotations )
316        {
317            annotation.emit( retValue, true );
318            retValue = retValue.emit( " " );
319        }
320
321        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
322        return retValue;
323    }   //  emitAnnotations()
324
325    /**
326     *  {@inheritDoc}
327     */
328    @Override
329    public final boolean equals( final Object o )
330    {
331        var retValue = this == o;
332        if( !retValue && o instanceof TypeNameImpl )
333        {
334            retValue = (getClass() == o.getClass()) && toString().equals( o.toString() );
335        }
336
337        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
338        return retValue;
339    }   //  equals()
340
341    /**
342     *  Returns a type name equivalent to that from the given
343     *  {@link TypeMirror}
344     *  instance.
345     *
346     *  @param  mirror  The given type mirror instance.
347     *  @return The respective type name.
348     */
349    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
350    public static final TypeNameImpl from( final TypeMirror mirror )
351    {
352        final var retValue = from( requireNonNullArgument( mirror, "mirror" ), Map.of() );
353
354        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
355        return retValue;
356    }   //  get()
357
358    /**
359     *  Returns a type name equivalent to that of the given
360     *  {@link Type}
361     *  instance.
362     *
363     *  @param  type    The type.
364     *  @return The respective type name for the given {@code Type} instance.
365     */
366    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
367    public static final TypeNameImpl from( final Type type )
368    {
369        final var retValue = from( requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ), Map.of() );
370
371        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
372        return retValue;
373    }   //  from()
374
375    /**
376     *  Returns a type name equivalent to that from the given
377     *  {@link TypeMirror}
378     *  instance.
379     *
380     *  @param  mirror  The given type mirror instance.
381     *  @param  typeVariables   The type variables.
382     *
383     *  @return The respective type name.
384     */
385    @API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.2.0" )
386    public static final TypeNameImpl from( final TypeMirror mirror, final Map<TypeParameterElement,TypeVariableNameImpl> typeVariables )
387    {
388        @SuppressWarnings( {"AnonymousInnerClassWithTooManyMethods", "OverlyComplexAnonymousInnerClass", "AnonymousInnerClass"} )
389        final var retValue = mirror.accept( new SimpleTypeVisitor14<TypeNameImpl,Void>()
390        {
391            /**
392             *  {@inheritDoc}
393             */
394            @Override
395            public final TypeNameImpl visitPrimitive( final PrimitiveType t, final Void p )
396            {
397                return switch( t.getKind() )
398                {
399                    case BOOLEAN -> BOOLEAN_PRIMITIVE;
400                    case BYTE -> BYTE_PRIMITIVE;
401                    case SHORT -> SHORT_PRIMITIVE;
402                    case INT -> INT_PRIMITIVE;
403                    case LONG -> LONG_PRIMITIVE;
404                    case CHAR -> CHAR_PRIMITIVE;
405                    case FLOAT -> FLOAT_PRIMITIVE;
406                    case DOUBLE -> DOUBLE_PRIMITIVE;
407                    //$CASES-OMITTED$
408                    default -> throw new AssertionError();
409                };
410            }   //  visitPrimitive()
411
412            /**
413             *  {@inheritDoc}
414             */
415            @Override
416            public final TypeNameImpl visitDeclared( final DeclaredType t, final Void p )
417            {
418                final var rawType = ClassNameImpl.from( (TypeElement) t.asElement() );
419                final var enclosingType = t.getEnclosingType();
420                final var enclosing = (enclosingType.getKind() != TypeKind.NONE) && !t.asElement().getModifiers().contains( Modifier.STATIC ) ? enclosingType.accept( this, null ) : null;
421                @SuppressWarnings( "AnonymousClassVariableHidesContainingMethodVariable" )
422                final TypeNameImpl retValue;
423                if( t.getTypeArguments().isEmpty() && ! (enclosing instanceof ParameterizedTypeName) )
424                {
425                    retValue = rawType;
426                }
427                else
428                {
429                    final var typeArgumentNames = t.getTypeArguments()
430                        .stream()
431                        .map( typeMirror -> get( typeMirror, typeVariables ) )
432                        .collect( toList() );
433                    //noinspection CastConflictsWithInstanceof
434                    retValue = enclosing instanceof ParameterizedTypeName
435                        ? ((ParameterizedTypeNameImpl) enclosing)
436                            .nestedClass( rawType.simpleName(), typeArgumentNames.stream().map( typeName -> (TypeName) typeName ).collect( toList() ) )
437                        : new ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( null, rawType, typeArgumentNames );
438                }
439
440                //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
441                return retValue;
442            }   //  visitDeclared()
443
444            /**
445             *  {@inheritDoc}
446             */
447            @Override
448            public final TypeNameImpl visitError( final ErrorType t, final Void p ) { return visitDeclared( t, p ); }
449
450            /**
451             *  {@inheritDoc}
452             */
453            @Override
454            public final ArrayTypeNameImpl visitArray( final ArrayType t, final Void p ) { return ArrayTypeNameImpl.from( t, typeVariables ); }
455
456            /**
457             *  {@inheritDoc}
458             */
459            @Override
460            public final TypeNameImpl visitTypeVariable( final javax.lang.model.type.TypeVariable t, final Void p ) { return TypeVariableNameImpl.from( t, typeVariables ); }
461
462            /**
463             *  {@inheritDoc}
464             */
465            @Override
466            public final TypeNameImpl visitWildcard( final javax.lang.model.type.WildcardType t, final Void p ) { return WildcardTypeNameImpl.from( t, typeVariables ); }
467
468            /**
469             *  {@inheritDoc}
470             */
471            @Override
472            public final TypeNameImpl visitNoType( final NoType t, final Void p )
473            {
474                @SuppressWarnings( "AnonymousClassVariableHidesContainingMethodVariable" )
475                final var retValue = t.getKind() == TypeKind.VOID
476                    ? VOID_PRIMITIVE
477                    : visitUnknown( t, p );
478
479                //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
480                return retValue;
481            }   //  visitNoType()
482
483            /**
484             *  {@inheritDoc}
485             */
486            @Override
487            protected final TypeNameImpl defaultAction( final TypeMirror e, final Void p )
488            {
489                throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Unexpected type mirror: " + e );
490            }
491        }, null );
492
493        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
494        return retValue;
495    }   //  from()
496
497    /**
498     *  Returns a type name equivalent to that of the given
499     *  {@link Type}
500     *  instance.
501     *
502     *  @param  type    The type.
503     *  @param  typeVariables   The type variables.
504     *  @return The respective type name for the given {@code Type} instance.
505     */
506    @SuppressWarnings( {"IfStatementWithTooManyBranches", "ChainOfInstanceofChecks", "OverlyComplexMethod"} )
507    @API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.2.0" )
508    public static final TypeNameImpl from( final Type type, final Map<Type,TypeVariableName> typeVariables )
509    {
510        final var retValue = switch( type )
511        {
512            case final Class<?> aClass -> {
513                if( aClass == void.class ) yield VOID_PRIMITIVE;
514                else if( aClass == boolean.class ) yield BOOLEAN_PRIMITIVE;
515                else if( aClass == byte.class ) yield BYTE_PRIMITIVE;
516                else if( aClass == short.class ) yield SHORT_PRIMITIVE;
517                else if( aClass == int.class ) yield INT_PRIMITIVE;
518                else if( aClass == long.class ) yield LONG_PRIMITIVE;
519                else if( aClass == char.class ) yield CHAR_PRIMITIVE;
520                else if( aClass == float.class ) yield FLOAT_PRIMITIVE;
521                else if( aClass == double.class ) yield DOUBLE_PRIMITIVE;
522                else if( aClass == Object.class ) yield OBJECT;
523                else if( aClass.isArray() ) yield ArrayTypeNameImpl.of( from( aClass.getComponentType(), typeVariables ) );
524                else yield ClassNameImpl.from( aClass );
525            }
526            case final ParameterizedType parameterizedType -> ParameterizedTypeNameImpl.from( parameterizedType, typeVariables );
527            case final WildcardType wildcardType -> WildcardTypeNameImpl.from( wildcardType, typeVariables );
528            case final TypeVariable<?> typeVariable -> TypeVariableNameImpl.from( typeVariable, typeVariables );
529            case final GenericArrayType genericArrayType -> ArrayTypeNameImpl.from( genericArrayType, typeVariables );
530            case null -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "type is null" );
531            default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "unexpected type: " + type );
532        };
533
534        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
535        return retValue;
536    }   //  from()
537
538    /**
539     *  Returns a type name equivalent to that from the given
540     *  {@link TypeMirror}
541     *  instance.
542     *
543     *  @param  mirror  The given type mirror instance.
544     *  @return The respective type name.
545     *
546     *  @deprecated Use
547     *      {@link #from(TypeMirror)}
548     *      instead.
549     */
550    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
551    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
552    public static final TypeNameImpl get( final TypeMirror mirror ) { return from( mirror ); }
553
554    /**
555     *  Returns a type name equivalent to that of the given
556     *  {@link Type}
557     *  instance.
558     *
559     *  @param  type    The type.
560     *  @return The respective type name for the given {@code Type} instance.
561     *
562     *  @deprecated Use
563     *      {@link #from(Type)}
564     *      instead.
565     */
566    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
567    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
568    public static final TypeNameImpl get( final Type type ) { return from( type ); }
569
570    /**
571     *  Returns a type name equivalent to that from the given
572     *  {@link TypeMirror}
573     *  instance.
574     *
575     *  @param  mirror  The given type mirror instance.
576     *  @param  typeVariables   The type variables.
577     *
578     *  @return The respective type name.
579     *
580     *  @deprecated Use
581     *      {@link #from(TypeMirror,Map)}
582     *      instead.
583     */
584    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
585    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
586    public static final TypeNameImpl get( final TypeMirror mirror, final Map<TypeParameterElement,TypeVariableNameImpl> typeVariables )
587    {
588        final var retValue = from( mirror, typeVariables );
589
590        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
591        return retValue;
592    }   //  get()
593
594    /**
595     *  Returns a type name equivalent to that of the given
596     *  {@link Type}
597     *  instance.
598     *
599     *  @param  type    The type.
600     *  @param  typeVariables   The type variables.
601     *  @return The respective type name for the given {@code Type} instance.
602     *
603     *  @deprecated Use
604     *      {@link #from(Type,Map)}
605     *      instead.
606     */
607    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
608    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
609    public static final TypeNameImpl get( final Type type, final Map<Type,TypeVariableName> typeVariables )
610    {
611        final var retValue = from( type, typeVariables );
612
613        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
614        return retValue;
615    }   //  get()
616
617    /**
618     *  {@inheritDoc}
619     */
620    @Override
621    public final int hashCode() { return toString().hashCode(); }
622
623    /**
624     *  The initializer for
625     *  {@link #m_CachedString}.
626     *
627     *  @return The return value for
628     *      {@link #toString()}.
629     */
630    private final String initialiseCachedString()
631    {
632        final var resultBuilder = new StringBuilder();
633        final var codeWriter = new CodeWriter( new JavaComposer(), resultBuilder );
634        try
635        {
636            emit( codeWriter );
637        }
638        catch( final UncheckedIOException e )
639        {
640            throw new UnexpectedExceptionError( e.getCause() );
641        }
642        final var retValue = resultBuilder.toString();
643
644        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
645        return retValue;
646    }   //  initialiseCachedString()
647
648    /**
649     *  {@inheritDoc}
650     */
651    @Override
652    public boolean isAnnotated() { return !m_Annotations.isEmpty(); }
653
654    /**
655     *  {@inheritDoc}
656     */
657    @SuppressWarnings( "SuspiciousMethodCalls" )
658    @Override
659    public final boolean isBoxedPrimitive()
660    {
661        final var retValue = List.of( BOXED_BOOLEAN, BOXED_BYTE, BOXED_SHORT, BOXED_INT, BOXED_LONG, BOXED_CHAR, BOXED_FLOAT, BOXED_DOUBLE )
662            .contains( this );
663
664        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
665        return retValue;
666    }   //  isBoxedPrimitive()
667
668    /**
669     *  {@inheritDoc}
670     */
671    @Override
672    public final boolean isPrimitive()
673    {
674        final var retValue = m_Keyword.isPresent() && (this != VOID_PRIMITIVE);
675
676        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
677        return retValue;
678    }   //  isPrimitive()
679
680    /**
681     *  Converts an array of types to a list of type names.
682     *
683     *  @param  types   The types.
684     *  @return The type names.
685     */
686    public static final List<TypeNameImpl> list( final Type... types ) { return list( types, new LinkedHashMap<>() ); }
687
688    /**
689     *  Converts an array of types to a list of type names.
690     *
691     *  @param  types   The types.
692     *  @param  typeVariables   The type variables.
693     *  @return The type names.
694     */
695    public static final List<TypeNameImpl> list( final Type [] types, final Map<Type,TypeVariableName> typeVariables )
696    {
697        requireNonNullArgument( typeVariables, "typeVariables" );
698        final var retValue = stream( requireNonNullArgument( types, "types" ) )
699            .map( t -> get( t, typeVariables ) )
700            .collect( toList() );
701
702        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
703        return retValue;
704    }   //  list()
705
706    /**
707     *  {@inheritDoc}
708     */
709    @Override
710    public final String toString() { return m_CachedString.get(); }
711
712    /**
713     *  {@inheritDoc}
714     */
715    @SuppressWarnings( {"MethodWithMultipleReturnPoints", "OverlyComplexMethod"} )
716    @Override
717    public final TypeNameImpl unbox()
718    {
719        if( m_Keyword.isPresent() ) return this; // Already unboxed.
720        if( equals( BOXED_VOID ) ) return VOID_PRIMITIVE;
721        if( equals( BOXED_BOOLEAN ) ) return BOOLEAN_PRIMITIVE;
722        if( equals( BOXED_BYTE ) ) return BYTE_PRIMITIVE;
723        if( equals( BOXED_SHORT ) ) return SHORT_PRIMITIVE;
724        if( equals( BOXED_INT ) ) return INT_PRIMITIVE;
725        if( equals( BOXED_LONG ) ) return LONG_PRIMITIVE;
726        if( equals( BOXED_CHAR ) ) return CHAR_PRIMITIVE;
727        if( equals( BOXED_FLOAT ) ) return FLOAT_PRIMITIVE;
728        if( equals( BOXED_DOUBLE ) ) return DOUBLE_PRIMITIVE;
729        throw new UnsupportedOperationException( "cannot unbox " + this );
730    }   //  unbox()
731
732    /**
733     *  {@inheritDoc}
734     */
735    @Override
736    public TypeNameImpl withoutAnnotations() { return new TypeNameImpl( m_Keyword.orElse( null ) ); }
737}
738//  class TypeNameImpl
739
740/*
741 *  End of File
742 */
